thread.title: Alabama fan drops 'Roll Tide, Roll' on 'The Price is Right' (Video)
thread.title_full: Alabama fan drops 'Roll Tide, Roll' on 'The Price is Right' (Video)

author: Dr. Saturday
title: Alabama fan drops 'Roll Tide, Roll' on 'The Price is Right' (Video)
text:
There is never an inappropriate time to drop a “Roll Tide,” right?
One of college football’s signature rallying cries found a new avenue last week, as “The Price is Right” became the latest unsuspecting outlet to get taken over by an Alabama fan.
Host Drew Carey asked a contestant named Annette if she had anyone she wanted to give a shout-out to. Oh, Annette was sure to mention her husband, her kids, her grandkids and a friend. Don’t worry about that.
[ Newsletter: Get 5 great stories from the Yahoo Sports blogs in your inbox every morning! ]
But the good stuff came at the end, with a powerful “Roll Tide, Roll” that was punctuated by her grabbing of the mic with one hand while fist-pumping with her other hand.
How has Annette not been on the Paul Finebaum Show yet?
